explanation: [0-0] A man carrying a stack of boxes is walking on a seaside road, wearing a red short-sleeved shirt and blue shorts. A woman is walking towards him, wearing a black top, black shorts and black shoes. The background is blue sky and white clouds, surrounded by beaches and modern buildings, with steps, streetlights and other tourists visible.

[0-2] The man walks forward and when he reaches the woman, he shakes the boxes in his arms vigorously. Multiple boxes are tied together and the top box tilts over, spilling water inside onto the woman. The woman is drenched by the sudden splash of water, her mouth wide open in surprise.

[0-2] The man walks forward and when he reaches the woman, he shakes the boxes in his arms vigorously. Multiple boxes are tied together and the top box tilts over, spilling water inside onto the woman. The woman is drenched by the sudden splash of water, her mouth wide open in surprise.

[2-4] The scene then switches to a tree-lined street, a man is carrying a tall stack of boxes. He is wearing a red T-shirt, blue jeans and black shoes and carrying a black backpack. A woman is walking in front of him looking at her phone; she is wearing a grey top, blue shorts, white sandals and carrying a black bag. The man shakes the cardboard boxes, multiple boxes are tied together and the top box tilts over, spilling colorful balls inside onto the woman. The woman is startled by the sudden situation and stares in surprise at the falling balls.

[2-4] The scene then switches to a tree-lined street, a man is carrying a tall stack of boxes. He is wearing a red T-shirt, blue jeans and black shoes and carrying a black backpack. A woman is walking in front of him looking at her phone; she is wearing a grey top, blue shorts, white sandals and carrying a black bag. The man shakes the cardboard boxes, multiple boxes are tied together and the top box tilts over, spilling colorful balls inside onto the woman. The woman is startled by the sudden situation and stares in surprise at the falling balls.

[4-7] Then, the scene switches to another tree-lined street, a man is carrying a tall stack of boxes. He is wearing red clothes and a red hat. Two women are walking towards him, one pushing a bicycle. She is wearing a black top, blue trousers and white shoes; the other woman next to her is wearing a yellow coat, black top, white trousers. The man deliberately knocks over the boxes in his arms to frighten the two women. The multiple boxes are tied together and do not fall. The two women smile and look at the boxes.

[4-7] Then, the scene switches to another tree-lined street, a man is carrying a tall stack of boxes. He is wearing red clothes and a red hat. Two women are walking towards him, one pushing a bicycle. She is wearing a black top, blue trousers and white shoes; the other woman next to her is wearing a yellow coat, black top, white trousers. The man deliberately knocks over the boxes in his arms to frighten the two women. The multiple boxes are tied together and do not fall. The two women smile and look at the boxes.

[4-7] Then, the scene switches to another tree-lined street, a man is carrying a tall stack of boxes. He is wearing red clothes and a red hat. Two women are walking towards him, one pushing a bicycle. She is wearing a black top, blue trousers and white shoes; the other woman next to her is wearing a yellow coat, black top, white trousers. The man deliberately knocks over the boxes in his arms to frighten the two women. The multiple boxes are tied together and do not fall. The two women smile and look at the boxes.

[7-9] Then, the scene switches to another tree-lined street, a man carrying a tall stack of boxes, wearing a grey top, blue jeans and black shoes. A man on a bicycle comes from the opposite direction, wearing black and red sportswear and a mask. The man with the boxes deliberately knocks over the boxes in his arms to frighten the cyclist, who covers his head in fright.

[7-9] Then, the scene switches to another tree-lined street, a man carrying a tall stack of boxes, wearing a grey top, blue jeans and black shoes. A man on a bicycle comes from the opposite direction, wearing black and red sportswear and a mask. The man with the boxes deliberately knocks over the boxes in his arms to frighten the cyclist, who covers his head in fright.

[9-11] Then, the scene switches to another tree-lined street. The same man carrying the cardboard boxes deliberately knocks over the cardboard boxes to frighten the two women walking towards him. One of the two women is wearing a dark blue top, blue jeans and white shoes, and a mask; the other is wearing a dark blue coat, black trousers and white shoes, also wearing a mask, and carrying a cup of milk tea. The two women are so startled by the sudden fright that they sit down on the ground and the milk tea in their hands spills out.

[9-11] Then, the scene switches to another tree-lined street. The same man carrying the cardboard boxes deliberately knocks over the cardboard boxes to frighten the two women walking towards him. One of the two women is wearing a dark blue top, blue jeans and white shoes, and a mask; the other is wearing a dark blue coat, black trousers and white shoes, also wearing a mask, and carrying a cup of milk tea. The two women are so startled by the sudden fright that they sit down on the ground and the milk tea in their hands spills out.
